item.title: Overhead Storage Bin(s)/Cabin and Galley Storage Compartments/Closets – Multi Latch/Quarter Turn Lug Installations

remarks.para: One latch/lug per component may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Remaining latch(es)/lug(s) on affected compartments are operative, and
If affected compartment is used for a galley cart, the cart remains empty.

placard.para: Install Placard next to Discrepant latch: "LATCH INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
